page.title: 14WHODUNNIT !!! THE CREDITS
page.content:
All 12 square kilometres in our block were surveyed by the 24 children in{ {BRAIDBAR PRIMARY SCHOOL'S PRIMARY 7} class (with a little help from 4 mums,and their teacher)
Here are the children's names...
{Nicola Ledingham }Stephanie Willis Fiona Holmes {Riona McEwen} {Paula Marshall }Paula Reynolds Lesley Beveridge {Iain Morrison} {John Marshall} Stephen Findlay Jamie Thom { Ammar Ashraf {Michael Ross } Ross Armstrong Marcus Barron { Kenneth Kerr {Kenneth Crawford} Sandy Robb Peter McVeigh { Colin Greenwood {Grant Terras } Scott Montgomery Chris Connell { Jackie Newell
